# Alliance for Democracy and the Republic

The Alliance for Democracy and the Republic (French: Alliance pour la démocratie et la république) (abbreviated ADR-Mahita ) is a political party in Niger led by .
History
The Alliance for Democracy and the Republic was registered as a political party on 28 September 2020. The first party congress took place on 24 October 2020 in Niamey.  was then elected president of the party.
